        public Board()

      • Board

        public Board(java.lang.String configFile)
      throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a board with custom cells placement. Read the documentation about the board configuration files for more details. TODO write documentation about board configuration file
        Parameters:
        configFile - the path to the board configuration file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - happens if the file could not be opened or if the file contains mistakes
